sentence.Network_en: Once they cleared the housetops, the wind was raw and biting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们清扫完屋顶后，寒风刺骨。

sentence.Network_en: The housetops, the trees, and the sparrows proclaimed the spring.
sentence.Network_cn: 屋顶, 树木以及麻雀都在宣布春天的到来.

sentence.Network_en: He was so happy that he wanted to shout it from the housetops.
sentence.Network_cn: 他乐得真想让每一个人都知道这事.

list.abs: install anteroom consequently ( the garden of the ground or housetop ) or the seat should make patient and meeting of family member nature are mixed chat .因而设置休息室(地面或屋顶的花园)或座位应能使病人及家属自然会面和交谈。
basically use at window of housetop scuttle , balcony .主要用于屋顶天窗、阳台窗。

the building with atriums is different from common buildings in characteristic , which has high interspaces , large space and large glass housetop or glass curtain wall .中庭建筑有不同于一般建筑的特点：空间高、体量大以及大面积的玻璃屋顶或玻璃幕墙。

a reservoir is built in housetop , have structure of wall of edaphic lay aside , some of alga , fish is put inside , form small-sized ecosystem with assuring water quality fresh .在屋顶建设一个蓄水池，有土壤贮壁结构，里面放些藻类、鱼类，形成小型生态系统以保证水质的新鲜。
